channel.title: Botting Sites
channel.description:
Anyone have any sites that are actively working on bots?
P.S. if you're going to come in and hate about botting, just don't even reply.

item.title: Botting Sites
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:49, topic:493388”][quote author=south-park link=topic=611620.msg4246247#msg4246247 date=1362097443]

tbh why bot? It takes the fun away from the game : D

No time to play, need the grind.

Then don’t play.

[/quote][/quote]
Better bump a three week old topic with a quote block.
Asshole.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting Sites
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:25, topic:493388”][quote author=south-park link=topic=611620.msg4244888#msg4244888 date=1362046291]
BOT IN EOC NOT 07! PLEASE DON’T FK THIS GAME AGAIN…
[/quote]It’s funny how before the 2007 servers got released everyone was so supportive of botting and now you’re all butthurt of people wanting to bot on these 2007 servers. I hope people bot the shit out of it just so you know what it feels like when you were bashing bot haters for rs2k11/12/13.

Also like it or not, this was or still is (idk), a rs cheating forum.[/quote]
I don’t bot in eoc. I hate botters. I wish they would stop botting in eoc aswell.

Read full topic
